dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who dares to challenge the might of Volkan, the Fire Giant? Speak quickly, before I turn you into ash!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Zarathos, Shadow Conqueror! Step aside, Volkan, or feel the wrath of my dark magic.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for one so fragile. Do you think your shadows can stand against the fury of elemental fire?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Try me, Volkan. Let's see who burns brighter!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You have courage, I'll give you that. But courage won't save you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough talk. Prepare yourself!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You speak your doom. Prepare to burn!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not waste my power on you. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coward! Return when you find your courage.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your fire is no match for my dark artifacts.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prove it then, shadow scum! Show me your power!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Feel the chill of the shadows as they consume your heat!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: This darkness... it is powerful. We shall see!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have better things to kill. Consider yourself lucky.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave, weakling, before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no quarrel with you, Volkan. Join me, and we shall rule the Darkened Veil together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces with you? Hmph, I am intrigued.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we can crush the Guardians of Light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You speak of promising devastation. Count me in, Zarathos.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: This alliance will be the end of all who oppose us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Indeed. Together, we will be invincible!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Greetings, Volkan. I seek your wisdom on this fiery plain.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom? From one such as I? You must either be desperate or foolish.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am neither. I seek knowledge to bolster my power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your quest for power amuses me. Speak, then!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: How do you command such destructive fire?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: It comes from within. A power you will never possess.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Share your secrets, and I will reward you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your rewards mean nothing to me, shadow-wielder. Seek your fortune elsewhere.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Even a giant can learn. Let us share our knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A tempting offer, but I require proof of your loyalty.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Name your challenge, and it will be done.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defeat my enemies, and you will have my respect.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Trust is earned, Volkan. Prove your worth.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fool! You dare question Volkan? Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see a spark of brilliance in you, Fire Giant.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Flattery will not sway me. Speak your purpose clearly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I propose an alliance against our common foes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmph. An alliance with a shadow? Unlikely.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer power in exchange for your aid.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: What power? Your shadows are weak compared to my flames.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do you remember the taste of fear, Volkan?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear is for the weak! You dare to provoke me with such words?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see no need for conflict, but I will fight if you insist.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conflict is all I live for! Prepare yourself, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: So be it. Let us end this.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your end is nigh!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, another time perhaps.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Run away, coward. You are not worth my flames.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fight me, and I will show you true fear.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words. Let us see if you can live up to them.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: With pleasure. Prepare to meet your doom!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bring it on, shadow wretch!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: On second thought, I'll return when I'm stronger.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pathetic. Return when you are ready to face the fire.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I bear no ill will. Let us part ways peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? From one who walks the shadows? I doubt it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Believe it or not, I have no quarrel with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fine, begone before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps one day, we shall meet as allies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unlikely, but perhaps.
